atk-s0511a9:1_0: Sobhitabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ buddhuppādarahitaṁ
atk-s0511a9:1_1: ahosi. Atīte pana tasmiṁ asaṅkhyeyye ekasmiṁ kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṁsu anomadassī,
atk-s0511a9:1_2: padumo, nāradoti. Tattha anomadassī bhagavā soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0511a9:1_3: pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā devehi abhiyācito tato cavitvā candavatiyaṁ
atk-s0511a9:1_4: nāma rājadhāniyaṁ yasavā nāmassa rañño kule samussitacārupayodharāya yasodharāya
atk-s0511a9:1_5: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṁ paṭisandhiṁ aggahesi. Anomadassikumāre kira yasodharāya
atk-s0511a9:1_6: deviyā kucchigate tassa puññappabhāvena pabhā asītihatthappamāṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ pharitvā
atk-s0511a9:1_7: aṭṭhāsi. Candasūriyappabhāhi anabhibhavanīyāva ahosi. Sā dasannaṁ māsānaṁ accayena
atk-s0511a9:1_8: bodhisattaṁ sucandanuyyāne vijāyi. Pāṭihāriyāni heṭṭhā vuttanayāneva.
atk-s0511a9:2_0: Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa nāmaṁ gaṇhantā, yasmā jātiyaṁ ākāsato satta ratanāni patiṁsu,
atk-s0511a9:2_1: tasmā anomānaṁ ratanānaṁ uppattihetubhūtattā ‘‘anomadassī’’ti nāmamakaṁsu. So anukkamena
atk-s0511a9:2_2: vuddhippatto dibbehi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāno dasavassasahassāni agāraṁ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a9:2_3: Tassa kira siri upasiri sirivaḍḍhoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṁ. Sirimādevippamukhāni tevīsati
atk-s0511a9:2_4: itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṁ. So sirimāya deviyā upavāṇe nāma putte jāte
atk-s0511a9:2_5: cattāri nimittāni disvā sivikāyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṁ
atk-s0511a9:3_0: Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso dasa māse padhānacariyaṁ cari. Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya anupamabrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0511a9:3_1: piṇḍāya caritvā anupamaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṁ madhupāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṁ
atk-s0511a9:3_2: vītināmetvā anomanāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ajjunarukkhabodhiṁ
atk-s0511a9:3_3: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhattiṁsahatthavitthataṁ tiṇasantharaṁ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṁ
atk-s0511a9:3_4: adhiṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā samāraṁ mārabalaṁ viddhaṁsetvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā
atk-s0511a9:3_5: uppādetvā – ‘‘anekajātisaṁsāraṁ…pe… taṇhānaṁ khayamajjhagā’’ti udānaṁ udānesi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a9:8: ‘‘So chetvā bandhanaṁ sabbaṁ, viddhaṁsetvā tayo bhave;
atk-s0511a9:15: Byāharantaṁ giraṁ sutvā, amataṁ pāpuṇanti te’’ti.
atk-s0511a9:16_0: Tattha anomadassīti anupamadassano, amitadassano vā. Amitayasoti amitaparivāro, amitakitti
atk-s0511a9:16_1: vā. Tejassīti sīlasamādhipaññātejena samannāgato. Duratikkamoti duppadhaṁsiyo, aññena
atk-s0511a9:16_2: devena vā mārena vā kenaci vā atikkamituṁ asakkuṇeyyoti attho. Sochetvā bandhanaṁ
atk-s0511a9:16_3: sabbanti sabbaṁ dasavidhaṁ saṁyojanaṁ chinditvā. Viddhaṁsetvā tayo bhaveti tibhavūpagaṁ
atk-s0511a9:16_4: kammaṁ kammakkhayakarañāṇena viddhaṁsetvā, abhāvaṁ katvāti attho. Anivattigamanaṁ
atk-s0511a9:16_5: magganti nivattiyā pavattiyā paṭipakkhabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ anivattīti vuccati, taṁ anivattiṁ
atk-s0511a9:16_6: gacchati anenāti anivattigamano. Taṁ anivattigamanaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ desesīti
atk-s0511a9:16_7: attho. ‘‘Dassetī’’tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. Devamānuseti devamanussānaṁ, sāmiatthe
atk-s0511a9:17_0: Asaṅkhobhoti khobhetuṁ cāletuṁ asakkuṇeyyoti akkhobhiyo. Yathā hi samuddo caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro
atk-s0511a9:17_1: anekayojanasahassabhūtāvāso akkhobhiyo, evaṁ akkhobhiyoti attho. Ākāsova anantoti
atk-s0511a9:17_2: yathā pana ākāsassa anto natthi, atha kho ananto appameyyo apāro, evaṁ bhagavāpi
atk-s0511a9:17_3: buddhaguṇehi ananto appameyyo apāro. Soti so bhagavā. Sālarājāva phullitoti sabbalakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīrattā
atk-s0511a9:17_4: suphullitasālarājā viya sobhatīti attho. Dassanenapi taṁ buddhanti tassa buddhassa
atk-s0511a9:17_5: dassanenāpīti attho. Īdisesupi sāmivacanaṁ payujjanti saddasatthavidū. Tositāti paritositā
atk-s0511a9:17_6: pīṇitā. Byāharantanti byāharantassa, sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṁ. Amatanti nibbānaṁ.
atk-s0511a9:17_7: Pāpuṇantīti adhigacchanti. Teti ye tassa giraṁ dhammadesanaṁ suṇanti, te amataṁ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:18_0: Bhagavā pana bodhimūle sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito dhammadesanāya
atk-s0511a9:18_1: buddhacakkhunā lokaṁ olokento attanā saha pabbajite tikoṭisaṅkhe jane upanissayasampanne
atk-s0511a9:18_2: disvā – ‘‘kattha nu kho te etarahi viharantī’’ti upadhārento subhavatīnagare sudassanuyyāne
atk-s0511a9:18_3: viharante disvā ākāsena gantvā sudassanuyyāne otari. So tehi parivuto sadevamanussāya
atk-s0511a9:18_4: parisāya majjhe dhammacakkaṁ pavattesi. Tattha koṭisatānaṁ paṭhamābhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a9:22: Tattha phītoti phātippatto bāhujaññavasena. Koṭisatānīti koṭīnaṁ satāni koṭisatāni. ‘‘Koṭisatayo’’tipi pāṭho, tassa satakoṭiyoti attho.
atk-s0511a9:23_0: Athāparena samayena osadhīnagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ katvā asurehi
atk-s0511a9:23_1: durabhibhavane tāvatiṁsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ nisinno temāsaṁ abhidhammavassaṁ
atk-s0511a9:23_2: vassāpayi. Tadā asītidevatākoṭiyo abhisamiṁsu. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a9:27: Tattha vassanteti buddhamahāmeghe vassante. Dhammavuṭṭhiyoti dhammakathāvassavuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0511a9:28: Tato aparena samayena maṅgalapañhāniddese aṭṭhasattati koṭiyo abhisamiṁsu. So tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a9:32: Tattha vassanteti dhammakathāsaliladhāraṁ vassante. Tappayanteti dhammāmatavassena tappayante, tappanaṁ karonte bhagavatīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:33_0: Anomadassissapi bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṁ. Tattha soreyyanagare isidattassa
atk-s0511a9:33_1: rañño dhamme desiyamāne pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ arahantasatasahassānaṁ
atk-s0511a9:33_2: majjhe pātimokkhaṁ uddisi. Ayaṁ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi. Rādhavatīnagare sundarindharassa
atk-s0511a9:33_3: nāma rañño dhamme desiyamāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ sattannaṁ arahantasatasahassānaṁ
atk-s0511a9:33_4: majjhe pātimokkhaṁ uddisi. Ayaṁ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Puna soreyyanagareyeva soreyyaraññā
atk-s0511a9:33_5: saha ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ channaṁ arahantasatasahassānaṁ majjhe pātimokkhaṁ
atk-s0511a9:33_6: uddisi. Ayaṁ tatiyo sannipāto ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a9:46_0: Tattha tassāpi ca mahesinoti tassa mahesino anomadassissāpi. ‘‘Tassāpi dvipaduttamo’’tipi
atk-s0511a9:46_1: pāṭho, tassapi dvipaduttamassāti attho. Lakkhaṇaṁ saddasatthato gahetabbaṁ. Abhiññābalappattānanti
atk-s0511a9:46_2: abhiññānaṁ balappattānaṁ, ciṇṇavasitāya khippanisantibhāvena abhiññāsu thirabhāvappattānanti
atk-s0511a9:46_3: attho. Pupphitānanti sabbaphāliphullabhāvena ativiya sobhaggappattānaṁ. Vimuttiyāti
atk-s0511a9:47_0: Anaṅgaṇānanti ettha ayaṁ aṅgaṇa-saddo katthaci kilesesu dissati. Yathāha – ‘‘tattha
atk-s0511a9:47_1: katamāni tīṇi aṅgaṇāni? Rāgo aṅgaṇaṁ doso aṅgaṇaṁ moho aṅgaṇa’’nti (vibha. 924).
atk-s0511a9:47_2: ‘‘Pāpakānaṁ kho etaṁ, āvuso, akusalānaṁ icchāvacarānaṁ adhivacanaṁ yadidaṁ aṅgaṇa’’nti
atk-s0511a9:47_3: (ma. ni. 1.60). Katthaci kismiñci male? Yathāha – ‘‘tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa
atk-s0511a9:47_4: vā pahānāya vāyamatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.184). Katthaci tathārūpe bhūmibhāge ‘‘cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ
atk-s0511a9:47_5: bodhiyaṅgaṇaṁ rājaṅgaṇa’’nti. Idha pana kilesesu daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā nikkilesānanti
atk-s0511a9:47_6: attho (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.57). Virajānanti tasseva vevacanaṁ. Tapassinanti kilesakkhayakaro
atk-s0511a9:47_7: ariyamaggasaṅkhāto tapo yesaṁ atthi te tapassino, tesaṁ tapassīnaṁ, khīṇāsavānanti attho.
atk-s0511a9:48_0: Tadā amhākaṁ bodhisatto eko mahesakkho yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo
atk-s0511a9:48_1: anekakoṭisatasahassānaṁ yakkhānaṁ adhipati. So ‘‘buddho loke uppanno’’ti sutvā āgantvā
atk-s0511a9:48_3: nimminitvā tattha sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi. Atha naṁ
atk-s0511a9:48_5: atikkante gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī’’ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a9:63: Tattha uttariṁ vatamadhiṭṭhāsinti pāramipūraṇatthāya bhiyyopi daḷhataraṁ parakkamamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:64_0: Tassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi, yasavā nāma rājā
atk-s0511a9:64_1: pitā, yasodharā nāma mātā, nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā, varuṇo nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a9:64_2: sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā, ajjunarukkho bodhi, sarīraṁ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṁ
atk-s0511a9:64_3: ahosi, vassasatasahassaṁ āyu, sirimā nāma aggamahesī, upavāṇo nāmassa putto, dasavassasahassāni
atk-s0511a9:64_4: agāraṁ ajjhāvasi. So sivikāyānena nikkhami. Sivikāyānena gamanaṁ pana sobhitabuddhavaṁsavaṇṇanāya
atk-s0511a9:64_5: pāsādagamane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Dhammako nāma rājā upaṭṭhāko. Dhammārāme kira
atk-s0511a9:79: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a9:84: ‘‘So ca satthā amitayaso, yugāni tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a9:86_0: Tattha pabhā niddhāvatīti tassa sarīrato pabhā nikkhamati. Sarīrappabhā panassa niccakālaṁ
atk-s0511a9:86_1: dvādasayojanappamāṇaṁ padesaṁ pharitvā tiṭṭhati. Yugāni tānīti aggasāvakayugādīni
atk-s0511a9:86_2: yugaḷāni. Sabbaṁtamantarahitanti vuttappakāraṁ sabbampi aniccamukhaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ vinaṭṭhanti
atk-s0511a9:86_3: attho. ‘‘Nanu rittakameva saṅkhārā’’tipi pāṭho, tassa nanu rittakā tucchakāyeva sabbe
atk-s0511a9:86_4: saṅkhārāti attho. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0511a9:87_0: Imassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato santike sāriputto ca mahāmoggallāno cāti ime
atk-s0511a9:87_1: dve aggasāvakā aggasāvakabhāvatthāya paṇidhānamakaṁsu. Imesaṁ pana therānaṁ vatthu
atk-s0511a9:87_2: cettha kathetabbaṁ. Mayā ganthavitthārabhayena na uddhaṭanti.
